message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.
That's a bit greedy Alice! How about a more realistic split? 70/30 sounds fair to me.
Okay, I'll compromise. 60/40 split.  It's still a good deal for me, but it's a step closer to what you're suggesting.
This is getting us nowhere, Alice. I'm meeting you halfway between our previous offers.  Take it or leave it - but remember, the clock is ticking!
